content: 3 working in the third loop of the previous row single_crochet into the same st as slip_stitch single_crochet into the third loop of first 15 st work 2 single_crochet increase into third loop of next st single_crochet into third loop of each st to the end then work 2 single_crochet increase into third loop of the final st slip_stitch into the first single_crochet of the row to join chain 1 34 st round 4 single_crochet in each st around slip_stitch into the first single_crochet of the row to join switch to accent color then chain 1 34 st round 5 using size i hook and accent color skip the first st and single_crochet into next st now work puff into the skipped st work skip st single_crochet into next st puff into skipped st around until you have 17 puff stitches all leaning to the left slip_stitch into first single_crochet of row to join be sure to join to the first single_crochet and not the puff st then turn your work and chain 1 17 puffs round 6 working on wrong side now skip the first st and single_crochet into next st now work puff into the skipped st in this round the puff stitches will be worked into the space between the previous round s puffs work skip st single_crochet into next st puff into skipped st around until you have 17 puff stitches all leaning to the left slip_stitch into first single_crochet of row to join switch to main color then turn your work and chain 1 17 puffs round 7 using size h hook and main color single_crochet in each st around slip_stitch into first single_crochet of row to join chain 1 34 st round 8 half_double_crochet in each of the first 16 st work 2 half_double_crochet increase into next st half_double_crochet in each st to the end then work 2 half_double_crochet increase in final st slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet of row to join chain 1 36 st round 9 working in the third loop of the previous row half_double_crochet into the same st as slip_stitch half_double_crochet into the third loop of each st around slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet of the row to join chain 1 36 st round 10 working in the third loop of the previous row single_crochet into the same st as slip_stitch single_crochet into the third loop of each st around after completing final single_crochet cut main color and use tapestry needle to work invisible join to first single_crochet or switch to accent color to work slip_stitch into first single_crochet of row to join turn your work and chain 2 with accent color 36 st page �2 of �3 © warm n fuzzies by amy 2021 round 11 using accent color and working on wrong side work double_crochet in first st slip_stitch in next st work double_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st around to the end slip_stitch or invisible join then cut yarn and finish off 18 double_crochet 18 slip_stitch
